content.detailedDescription: Noticed lights outside my livingroom window and went to get my phone to take a picture. watched for a minute then returned to my home.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Noticed lights outside window.

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed a ufo flying very low over penacook on tuesday, april 10 at approximately 8:45 pm. i went outside around the indicated time facing south. once outside, i heard a sound that i can only describe as a deep humming that had a rhythmic quality to it. this did not sound like an airplane or a helicopter. i then noticed a craft which appeared to be hovering over, what i would guess, was near merrimack valley high school. i noticed the craft seemed to be spotlighting on the ground below. i initially thought it to be a helicopter until my mind registered what i was really seeing and hearing. this craft then very slowly moved toward the east. i noticed the craft was equilaterally triangular in shape, with orange lights in the corner of each point. the beam of light i had seen was emitting from its center. as the craft moved to the left of where it had been, from my vantage point, the beam of light cut out and became a bright red pulsating light, larger in size than the orange lights on the points. at this time, i knew what i was witnessing was technology i have not known humans to be capable of producing. my heart raced, but i continued to watch intently in amazement. the orange lights moved in a circular motion, as if very slowly rotating as it moved to the left. i noticed to the left of this craft, was what appeared to be another. this one was much less prominent and detailed than the first. i could clearly make out the shape and the defined individual lights on the first craft, while the second one appeared to be one orange star-like light. i attempted to take a picture of these two craft with my 1.3 megapixel cell phone camera, but only resulted in a picture of a white dot. these two craft continued their path to the left remaining exactly the same distance from each other and at exactly the same rate of speed. they moved as a perfect pair. i watched them continue their path to the east until they were over, what i would guess to be the merrimack river or i-93 when they suddenly changed direction to the north. it was a rapid change of direction. not a perfect 90 degree turn with a point, but a 90 degree turn with a slight curve when made; much faster than i���ve ever known an airplane or helicopter to make alone, let alone two to do perfectly synchronized.  i watched the craft fly off to the north until they were beyond the one-story roofline of the building i had exited before witnessing these craft.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle with orange lights at points and red pulsating light/beam of light from center. loud deep throbbing hum noise. two possible crafts.

content.detailedDescription:
I have had 4 sightings over the years the one above was in the mid 60's. was sleeping out w/friends,not really getting any sleep. was laying on a sleeping bag on the ground looking up at the sky, it was a very clear night.  all of a sudden i saw what looked like a star moving across the sky, it appeared to be as high up as the stars. it went a short distance across the sky and then just stopped. i watched the spot until i fell asleep. i didn't say anything to the other guys due to it happening so fast, and trying to pick out the light in the sky with all the stars would have been pointless. and they would have said your seeing things.

the other sightings i had were in the 80's while on patrol. (policeman) these sightings were also bright lights but weren't real high in the sky. there were on flashing lights or any noise. in two of these sightings the object seemed to be hovering in the sky until it seemed like it knew i was watching it and took off across the sky at very high rate of speed, again there was no sound or any other lights flashing or blinking, just one bright light. the other sighting was just a bright light moving across the sky from west to east, no sound or any other blinking or flashing lights.

i was in the military, on an aircraft carrier so i know what planes and helicopters sound and look like. and over the years as a police officer i have observed thousands of airplanes and helicopters while on the night shift. these objects i observed did not resemble any aircraft i know of.
content.summary: Looked like a star moving slowly across sky then just stopped.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out on to my porch to smoke. i sensed something that made me look up and to my west. i saw a light orange small circle traveling at a very high rate of speed from what looked to be not to far away. i tracked this orange circle with my eyes until it was pretty much directly above me. it looked as if it went into a low and pretty small cloud but it didn't come out of the other side. it literally made the hair on my arms stand up. i have been studying aviation since childhood, i know my planets, i've witnessed countless shooting stars, etc etc. i have never seen anything like this. when it was nearly overhead it seemed as if it had a light orange glow but it didn't have a glare. it looked to me as if it had a straight line flight path. my gut feeling is that it may have been stationary until i looked up and it traveled into the cloud. i can't explain what made me look precisely into the direction it came from. i have been able to stop thinking about it.
content.summary: Orangish ball traveling at a high rate of speed. no trail.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside shooting fireworks,roman candles and bottle rockets mostly. while my mother watched me from the porch. i don't remember how many bottle rockets were shot, before this object was seen. there was just one at the time chasing the fire works when they popped in the air. i can not remember my emotinons at the time,i was young when this happend,but is something i will never forget.After a few minutes passed by 4 more showed up. now there is a total of 5 and they are chasing each other like a tag game. they moved so fast going from side to side up and down and just staying still. no noise at all. my mother and i were standing in the driveway watching this for at least a half hour. these objects were low enough where we could see the bottoms just fine. they were all the same size and about the sise of 2 full size pick-up trucks. triangle shape with 3 lights. i could not how ever see the tops or the sides of the objects even though they had lights the top and sides were just to dark to see.While they were chasing each other we heard a loud rumble and when i turned around to see what it was i saw more lights,my mother was scared now and she grabbed me to head back into the house, when out from the tree tops a group of helicopters came flying by. the objects were still in sight and they all left together very fast. from the view it did look like they shot straight up in the sky.To this day i look at the sky every day and night,but i have never seen them or anything of this nature again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Objects chasing fireworks and each other,

content.detailedDescription:
Leaving the grocery store on a short errand, about 10:45 pm, walking accross the public parking lot to my car, i looked up and noticed an orange shape descending, it looked like a flame.  there was a stranger walking beside me, i pointed and said "hey, look at that!" she stopped and looked.  we both stood and looked at it for about 10 seconds.  i had no idea what it was, but i've seen things i couldn't explain in the sky quite recently but have been too reticent to report.  but this time, i had a witness. (two other witnesses actually, one lady a stranger, was late on the scene but saw it moving away after it had changed course) the object seemed to stop decending, change shape and direction, but not color (orange) and it ceased looking like a flame/mist and began to look like a craft with a trajectory going away from me.

i was frozen for a couple minutes, i confirmed with the other lady that i was not "crazy" and did in fact just see that.  she agreed.  we both got in our cars and drove away.  i drove down the parking lot and stopped my car, turned on my flashers, turned off my car, and sat on my hood looking for the object, it appeared that it was then gone.  i felt angry, like there is some activities that our government is not telling us about, i mean, something like this, surely should make at least local news.

i lost sight of the object when i drove away the first time to go park and look again.

i came home and awakened my wife and told her what i saw, and reminded her that this is like the third thing i've seen recently, but this time had a witness to boot.
content.summary: Descending orange flame made no noise but misty and glowed, then turned abruptly changing shape and direction

content.detailedDescription:
I'm a grown man who still feels a little bit like a little kid every time i see an aircraft in flight. if i'm outside and one goes by, i've never been able to keep from diverting attention to it. in his day, my grandfather was in the air force, and so instilled in me a deep appreciation for aviation/aeronautics at an early age. it's still with me today. all i'm saying is, although i'm no expert by any stretch, i've always paid an above average amount of attention to passing aircraft, and up to this point i have never seen an object in the sky, even passing satellites, that i couldn't positively identify.

while driving through a neighborhood just after sunset, i noticed an object in the sky, to the west of my location, headed east. at first i thought it was a helicopter, because through the trees, it's perceived size, altitude, and speed, matched that of the common medical/news/misc chopper you see frequently in the area. we also have frequent, often daily fly-overs of military apache helicopters, but this object seemed to move, at least at first, a bit faster than the typically observed apache cruising speed. 

intrigued, i exited the neighborhood and got a better look, with no obstruction from trees. although with rdu very close by, and the area not far from a large commercial flight path, i ruled out fixed wing aircraft immediately because i noticed the object was clearly round, or egg-shaped. within a couple of seconds, a light coming from roughly the center of the object became very bright. i originally mistook this light for a typical forward facing nose or wing-mounted 'headlight'. but, as the craft got closer, and also slowed down very rapidly, and began to hover, the light began to burn bright like fire. 

at this point, i turned on to another neighborhood street and immediately parked with the object in clear view. it had slowed to almost a complete stop, but with some slight drifting. it's shape was somewhat oval, like an up-side down egg, and had a bright light burning in the center. on a quiet evening with almost no noise pollution, i could hear no sound from coming from the object. all of these characteristics combined to remind me of the many hot air balloons i'd seen growing up in the midwest. however, when it slowed down, it's size and structural shape where much smaller, darker, and solid in appearance. based on it's distance from me, i assessed it to be roughly the size of the average mid-sized suv. 

the light quickly grew so bright and firey that i realized it was not being put out by the object, but was actually a reflection of the sun, that had just dipped below the horizon. over about 10 seconds, it slowly drifted out of the waning sunbeam, and went completely dark. it had no lights of it's own, but was still very visible in the still back-lit light blue sky. 

so, after pursuing it's original course when i first sighted it, which i perceived to be eastward, and then pausing to drift for 10-15 seconds, it begin to move and pick up speed in a north-west direction. i pursued it through the neighborhood, but came to a dead end, and the object quickly disappeared behind a treeline. when i was able to get out to the main road, and searched in the area i thought it to be headed, it was nowhere to be seen. i attempted to capture it on my iphone, but the video is not worth watching.

overall- just after sunset, near the intersection of high house and 55 in cary, nc, i observed an object that appeared to be several hundred feet up, and at it's closest, several hundred feet away. it appeared rounded or oval-shaped, suv-sized, with no lights of it's own, and no sounds that i could hear. i observed this object traveling in my general direction, slowing, for a brief time intensely reflecting the waning sunlight, hovering, then traveling away.
content.summary: Dark object hovering after sunset, no lights, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was standihg at town common and glanced down rt 140 saw street light much brighter and pure white in comparison to 10 or so outher st lights it was the furthest one away about one half mile afew minutes later i noticed it was on rhe outher side of road me and a friend began to walk twoards it we meet at cumberland farms store this craft was 30 to forty ft. aboouve me i became so exited i began jumping up and down screaming come down come down it sat stanary for a goo two minutes that is when the 3 corner lights began to change to amber it moved up to about n500 ft. thentook of at blinding speed in a north northwest direction least to say i was in awe . i only then noticed my friend was running away. istayed a few more minutes to try to understand what just happend then 4 f 15 eagles in 2 by 2 cover formation at below 800 ft. came into view the funny thing is they followed the exact flight path as if their radar was showing the ufo still at each waypoint it changed my life compleatly now i am dedicated to the study of all craft that are unidentified i know what i saw and have been telling this story since rember this was before cable shows or any way to get informati0on on what i saw i am one of the few who can say uequivicly this was a real ufo no sound no heat no wind nothing now u see it now u dont 3 yrs ago my mom ,cousin alice and the milk man arrived at work 430 am in worcester mas and saw a cigar shaped objecct with the same charicteristices no sound all that stuff then it took off slowly and accelerated to just gone that fast then she became a beliver and appoligezed to me for doughting me. thank you for reading this feel free to call me because it was like it happened yesterday to me and i want to join your team sincerly b paul labbe
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle 30 ft by30 by 30 ft. bright beam from center one red light in each corner changed to orangey yellowish

content.detailedDescription:
At the end of a stay at the ventana canyon resort in the tucson santa catalina mountains i was taking general area photos of the resort from my room balcony. i did not notice anything at the time this photo was taken. i first noticed the object in the photo while processing the images of my stay.

i was surprised to see an object in an otherwise totally cloudless sky, so i attempted to enhance the object to bring out any additional details i could.

upon altering contrast and brightness it appears that the object has a physical form, and it also seems to have multiple colors. it is possible that the colors are an artifact of the digital photo process, but i believe the object is made of sufficient pixels to reveal that it actually does have shape, and color. the red and blue colors on the enlarged version do not appear to be the typical fringe colors you would find in a digital photo from my experience.

i also found that with the artificial color enhancement the pixels below the object were significantly different from any other pixels on or near the object. you can see this in the submitted photo as the blue area directly below the object.

i would like to hear from anyone else with similar object photos.
content.summary: Object showed up during processing of images shot with canon 30d digital slr

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i were driving s on us 101(n. california =humboldt cty)  coming homefrom a halloween party when we both sawthis large "rack" of white lights - not blinking- in a triangular shape.  we both saw it at the same time and came toa complete stop in the middle of the hightway--we both went "what the heck?" but i was nervous so we continued on our way...
content.summary: Driving s on calif 101 in southern humboldt cty --saw a tirangular shape of white lites emerging from behind a mtn near the highway--maybe 3 mi away got scared and kept driving

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and daughter noticed a light flying over a field in back of our house at about 9:30 pm. she first dismissed it thinking it was a helicopter flying low. about ten minutes later it flew back the other way. just then i came into the room and she mentioned the light and what did i think it was doing. i noticed that it was coming towards our house so i ran outside to see what it could be. when we looked up there it was right over the house. it was about 100 ft. up,triangular shaped with rounded corners and the sound it had was a low hum. the speed was about that of a slow moving helicopter. it had three red lights, one in each corner, a large white light in the center and a strobe light on it's front. the bottom of the craft had a lead/gray color and appeared mottled. we watched it moving back and forth as it proceeded down over our neighbors pasture. my wife says it seemed like it was looking for something or maybe like it was mapping something. it was 20 degrees below zero that night and we were standing outside without jackets or shoes. we didn't persue it and wish we had now. 
the next day there were several people who called into the local radio staion asking if anyone else had seen this thing. we also saw an article in a little newspaper in the northern part of our county which talked about several people observing a similar flying object two weeks before. one person said they saw it hovering over the community medical building late one night and the other person said they were at a different angle on a hill and saw windows with some beings inside. we are not sure if it was the same object we saw, but the description sounded similar. a very exciting experience!
content.summary: Observed a flying object in a field in back of our home. object then came flying over our house about 100 ft. up.

content.detailedDescription: I previously sent you this info.
content.summary: I previously provided this info.

content.detailedDescription: Saw many objecs in sky with flashing lights and hovering at different times.
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Hovering and flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was at home,feeling strange for a few days,compelled to go outside,seen jets flying over then the circular object dropped out of the clouds,hardly any sound,just a low hum,moving very slow,watched it go southwest,then it went back up in the clouds,felt happy,for some reason i knew what i was about to see.
content.summary: Compelled to go outside,dropped out of the clouds long enough for me to see it ,heading southwest

content.detailedDescription:
in 1994 i went on a road trip out west with 7 others. i live in chicago and we were headed to arizona. was an interesting ride. 

we were at the south east rim of the grand canyon, navajo point is it's name. there are a few parking spots there, and small observation spot. this just a very small spot on the canyon, the more popular spots are down the road. the sun had set and there was no moon. we were all in our own little worlds enjoying the amazing night sky. i live in the citu and i'm lucky if on a clear night i can see 15 stars.

i was in total awe of the night sky out there, it is totally amazing. for the first time i understood why they call it the milky way, the sheer density of the star field, incredible. so we were all enjoying the sky, you could easily see "shooting stars" and satellites. there i am alone but not far from the others when i hear a loud, "what the hell is that???!!" i went over to where it came from, we all gathered there in a line, and there they were in the sky.

in the southern sky at about maybe a 50 degree angle were 2 large lights. a big one following a smaller one. they appeared as large lights in the sky. to give an idea of how large they looked, the larger one was like 25 stars put together in size. they both were bright with a orangish color, the smaller of the 2 had more of a uniform color, whiter. the larger one had a whiteish center surrounded by an orangish hue. they moved across the sky from west to east in a slight arc/downward angle. they didn't just move in a line though, the surged and stopped, surged and stopped. it was very fluid though, the pauses they made were not jerky, the motion was smooth. they continued across the sky until the smaller one, the one in front appeared to stop moving while the other continued, but it didn't stop. it started to get smaller, and fainter until it disappeared straight off into space. then the other did the same. we all watched it as it got smaller, and smaller, until finally it was gone. the entire time i was the only one who spoke, and i repeated the same thing over and over, "what the @#%$ is that??!!, can anyone tell me what the @#%$ that is??!!" none of us had an answer. now we're not rocket scientists, but we we're not morons either. we tried to figure out what it could have been, plane, helicopter, weather balloon (lol) and no matter what rational explanation we came up with, there was always a reason why it couldn't have been that. we concluded that there wasn't an explanation, and we didn't know what it was.  5 people including myself all saw the same thing. 

i can't sit here and say that it was for sure, 100% an "alien" spaceship. there was a "craft", or vehicle, and it definitely disappeared right off into space. so i'm basically at 2 conclusions, either it was "aliens", or someone here on earth has technology hundreds of years ahead of anything the public knows about.

i didn't believe in ufo's before this happened, i was a skeptic. i figured that life had to be out there someplace. i don't even consider myself to believe in ufo's now either, that's like saying that you believe in trees, nobody believes in trees, they are there. belief is for santa, god, and leprechauns.
content.summary: 2 craft disappeared into space

content.detailedDescription:
It was night time and i have just got out of class and i was walking to my car in the parking lot where the sighing took place. i notice a guy standing on the sidewalk of the parking lot looking up at the sky with this dumbfounded look on his face. i immediately looked up at the same direction he was which was north and saw that the object was traveling south. it was a bright yellow, red, flashing pulsating object with organize structure to it within the pulsation and flashing in itself. i cant pin down the description of the structure but there was something that was structure within the flashing and pulsation. 
        the flying object was in a sense floating smoothly in the sky but traveling at a high speed in the sense of the altitude that it was in (approx 500 feet to a mile). any aircraft would have been recognizable and heard at this type of altitude and a falling  rock from space would have travel in one direction and left a trail of smoke behind its path. the flying object made a left and right turn within seconds apart, the pulsating  became brighter as it flew north in our direction then the pulsating and brightness diminish to a small star type of light and immediately at a high speed ascended in a 90 degree angle higher up into the sky and disappeared. within approx 6 min later a airplane and helicopter appeared in the area. theres a airport 6 mile west from were the sighting took place. 
       during the sighting i felt excited and surprise, i couldn't believe what i saw as i was trying to decipher to myself a logical explanation of what it was that i was seeing, but what i saw spoke for itself. this event came to answer one of my scientific questions and that is that ufo's do exist. this event last approx 7 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo sighting outside college campus

content.detailedDescription:
I sit outside by the pool every night and watch and wait for the jet fighters to come back to luke airforce base. i also see many other commercial planes because of all the airports. as i watched i viewed a light in the sky that glowed brighter ( not as brite as the jet fighters strobe) heading east and turned south, before it moved behind a cloud i saw it blink, i watched and waited about ten minutes but it never came out of that cloud and even if it turned west i would have seen it and it never exited the cloud. the cloud wasn't that big as opposed to the craft, it should have gone thru it in a few seconds but didn't. as i waited a very high commercial jet flew a diagonal flight ( much higher) in a close vacinity.
this makes number 11 i and some family members have seen in about 10 months. 
what is ironic is that about 12 fighther jets came thru just 2-3 minutes before that viewing where they mostly fly over my home or somewhat close to it.
my visual tells me that the craft was coming in from a higher altitued before it turned into the cloud.
jet airplanes have to have flashing red-green lights and strobes and as stated i see these all the time, but this craft had none and i can see jet aircraft way up high i am assuming 50 thousand feet but you can see these strobes.
this siting wasn't as defined as others i have viewed such as the fireballs
content.summary: Bright light change direction

content.detailedDescription: I was at the apricot inn on my way to yucca valley i looked at the sun and saw the orb it was hovering then moved then stopped went sideways and then at incrible speed went into the sky
content.summary: The orb moved then abruptly stopped then stayed stationary then moved up sideways then flew up into the sky really fast

content.detailedDescription: April 25 went to my sons home in arlington vt.To visist my grandchildren watched ranger game then left at about 10:40pm drove down dark rt 7a noticed a glow from my passenger front windshield. slowed to stop in pine trees and saw large glowing sphere. moved another 10 ft then watched through another gap in trees and turned off my car lights. i knew it was not moon there were not features just this perfect sphere at probable 100 ft. it was beyond trees and over meadow in front of mountain. i moved again about 20 ft to next opening and saw perfectly again. i noticed my car move onto grass and corrected back when turned to see glow and sphere gone. turned around, went back but nothing. drove to my motel where wife was. my cell phone was charging in room because was late and no reception in this area. told wife then walked outside to find any moon. was none. trouble getting to sleep. went in morn to manchester police to report. then went back to sons cabin and looked for moom phase on his computer to find there was only a tiny crescent. got home on long island and called hayden planetarium spoke to a director who asked me a number of questions. and finally said to me "neil it seems like saw what me and my collegues have been looking for our entire lives" i am very uneasy since this. i dont know what to do. this was perfectly clear visibility. why did i see this when there are so many remote areas near. it must have seen my headllights. i have tried to find anyone who may  have seen but nothing. i called the local manchester vt. paper to tell also. i want to scream to the world what i saw. im 64 5 grandkids, havnt had drink in 9 yrs. im drug free. someone please respond
content.summary: Sphere glowing dimly lit orange with small milky unsymetrical  center

content.detailedDescription: @ approx 10:34 pm bst i went out into the garden with one of the dogs, looked up and saw a bright red light moving north to s east in quite an erratic manner, not steady but a bit uneven in course & speed, had no navigation strobes, was silent and moved quite rapidly, crossing the sky in around 25 - 40 seconds. i don't believe it was a lantern as there is little wind blowing and what there is is from the other direction. an airliner came into view heading into luton airport, i think the crew will certainly have seen it, it passed across the path of the jet and seemed to be perhaps a bit higher, the light went into cloud just as the jet came over. sounds odd i guess but got a rather creepy feeling seeing this. i am not saying this was an alien craft, i am not saying anything about where this object might be from because how would i know? but is was very strange. no strobes, silent, bright red, quite fast and erratic and up at an altitude where it went into cloud against the wind. the object looked like a bright red firework,  the fact that it went into cloud against prevailing surface wind was very odd, so, clearly not a lighted balloon or similar.
content.summary: Very bright red light,  fairly eratic in speed, moved quickly, crossed sky dissapered into cloud in proximity to plane.

content.detailedDescription: After a 9-10 year old football game at east mecklenburg high school in charlotte, nc, 3 red lights were spotted by my wife and myself as well as a couple behind us and a few people leaving the game. the lights were in a straight line. the right light went out first then the left light followed by the middle. they all stayed stationary and there was no noise detected. there was nothing dripping from them and they never changed color. it was a cloudy night so they were lower than the cloud cover but i can't be sure of how far off the ground they were and i could not make out a single form or multiple forms. i was a little excited while filming then relaxed after the lights went out.
content.summary: 3 red lights hovered over east meck high school charlotte, nc

content.detailedDescription: Me and two friends where riding through swainsboro ga monday may 1 2012. it was clear and alm outside when these 3 lights where coming toward car then just dissappeared. they then repeared in the sky but it was more and as they cut on they cut off in the same pattern. after that these big orangish lights would appear and as the would appear it was like they would b cut off without moving. but they would reappaer over a 15 min period in differnt locations. the sky seemed to b filled with a bunch of spakrly lights. they were moving so no stars and were moving way to fast to be planes.  but we stopped and got out to watch and could here this noise not like a jet but louder and it was moving fast and would get quite thats when we would see the orange lights. heard it twice and never heard a sound in the sky like it before. ive always been a skeptic but im a believer now after witnessing this. can someone explain?
content.summary: First there was these brihht light seemed tp b coming at our car then dissappeared. then these big orange spheres that seemed to come on then dim a little then go away just as they showed up. like being cut off. saw many sparklimg lights in sky moving fas

content.detailedDescription: Two of my friends were driving me home from playing basketball at the public park. i was in the backseat of the car, my friend in the passenger seat pointed out what we thought was nothing but an airplane with beautiful colors. it was flashing green and pink lights. it seemed odd to me that it was flying so low, but then things started getting really weird. this craft completely stopped flying in an instant, and hovered motionless in the same spot for about half a minute before carrying on. another weird thing about this craft is it started to descend towards a part of town that doesn't even have an airport! i was in complete shock and i didn't know what to think of this. my only problem is that i was so shocked, and it happened so fast, that i didn't have the chance to take any pictures or video. i just want to know if anybody else from my area seen the same thing.
content.summary: Stoped flying abruptly, then continued and started to decend

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving around and noticed 2 lights in the sky that wernt there before, we pulled the car over to watch them, as we took out our camera one of them dissapeared..The other one stayed as we took pictures, after a few minutes the one that had dissapeared had come back..We watched them hover and move around as we were taking pictures another one came into view. we watched them for around 15 minutes before they left
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Bright fireball lights that moved around and hovered in cow bay ns

content.detailedDescription:
I was grilling on our deck, when i happened to notice a bright star in the sky. i figured at first it was the planet venus, as venus passes through where this object was.  but, i noticed that venus was about 30 deg west of this object. then i noticed the object was moving towards me.  the object was coming in from the nw, heading south towards where we live, which is about 15 miles se of temecula, ca.  it was moving slowly, but steadily.  there was no sound from it at all.  even the commercial jets that fly over us at a good 10k ft, still make sound.  this object was even lower than any of the planes fly over here.  it had no blinking lights, or colors besides white.  it was slightly larger than venus, and was definitely as bright as venus, if not more.  where we live is rural, so we have little light pollution.  part of the reason is because the palomar observatory is above us, we are in the foothills of the palomar mtns.  

this was at about 9:28-9:30 pm, and the object took about a good 5 minutes to move towards me.  i wanted to get my camera, but was afraid it would disappear.  so i waited until the object was directly above my house.  then i ran inside, grabbed my camera, and was gone a minute or less.  however, the object was already to the far southern sky, and then it just disappeared.  the object had to have accelerated. it should have just been going over the other side of my house, due to the speed it was going at, but instead was now a good 40-50 miles away.

also, to note...We have many different types of planes that fly over our house.  there are many military bases around here, and they fly helicopters, planes, and jets.  plus, commercial aircraft fly over our homes.  planes can definitely be made out as planes, with flashing red & blue lights.  provided we have a clear night, which is most nights, you can even make out the detail of the planes.  i couldn't make out any detail of this object.  it looked like a flying venus, but a bit bigger.  

this is also not the first ufo sighting i have had at this location.  i have had at least 3 sightings now in a little over a year.  there are also many other questionable objects i've seen, but none of them were as distinct as these 3.  also, when this object was flying towards me, and then overhead of me, i got this sensation.  perhaps like a magnetic sensation, hairs standing on end, like you would feel when a storm is coming.  it's like you could feel the electricity in the air, and it was coming from this object.  

mufon should do an investigation of this area, as i believe it is a vortex.  i was told before i moved here, that the area was known for ufo sightings, there is a high military presence, and the area gives off a higher than normal electromagnetic reading.
content.summary: Slow, then fast flying object that was as bright, if not brighter than venus.

content.detailedDescription: It was april 25th in the morning at around 2:45 a.M i couldn't sleep so i went out side to smoke and as i stepped out side i could hear the faint sound of the train  passing through town so as i could no longer hear the train i exhaled smoke upwards as i looked at the sky at that point i froze and was awestruck at what i saw it was a very large object of no sound and it blinked multiple colors of red blue green yellow and various shades of white it blinked mostly red and the lights circled the craft in an odd formation it hovered in the sky for 3 minutes in time at least before it flared up red and vanished into thin air the whole time i was watching it i was thinking please don't disappear please don't disappear because i have heard story's of the hyper jump and after it vanished i was not done smoking my cigarette and i flicked it half way through and ran back inside into the apartment startled and scared of what i just saw i could no longer sleep in a fear that i might get abducted i felt as i was watching this object it knew i was watching it i only heard story's of this and could not believe what i saw so as my insomnia keeps me up i was curious to look outside so i opened the shades  and watched outside for a while before i had the heart to go back out side it must of been a half hour after the sighting i seen a jet fly by in the same direction that the ufo was hovering toward and my story doesn't end yet i was trying to sleep on the couch but could not as i kept looking out the window at this time it had to be 4 or 4:30 as i was looking out the window i saw a bright silver light flare up and vanish in a blink of an eye you could miss it so still not able to sleep i go outside again to have another cigarette and it had to be 5 and the sun was about the rise i could see daylight on the horizon so i am on the front porch smoking again and i look to my right and i see a small blinking metallic orb it had to be a mile away in distance so i run inside and grab binoculars and go back out it was still flying across and as i peer in the binoculars i see its dropping orbs out of it and they start multiplying in that fashion it multiplied into about 20 individual objects i watched them float stationary and jump all over erratically for 30 minutes until the sun came up and they were hardly visible to the naked eye this is the first time i have seen unknown objects in the detroit lakes minnesota area
content.summary: Seen multiple ufo's in detroit lakes mn

content.detailedDescription: I was running late at night on august 16 2011 and listening to the radio on my fathers iphone and i stopped to rest at at an elementary school playground and i while i was looking through the phone i looked up and across the field floating about the trees was a green orb somewhere between 15-25 feet wide and as soon as i saw it it seemed to notice that i was observing it and it then hid behind the tree line, which is a residential area, and as it went behind the trees i could clearly see the trees being silhouetted by the green sphere naturally i thought it would come back up so i opened up the camera app on my dads phone and made a video recording of that area for the next few minutes until i gave up and realized it wasn't coming back up from the ground. it took me about 30 seconds to open up app and start recording and the time indicate in the video said 1:23:29 so it happened at almost exactly 1:23 am. canada's largest airforce base is 6 km away but this was clearly not an aircraft since it was floating silently about 100 m away from me about the trees and it had no definable edges just a perfectly circular sphere glowing a vibrant green. my first thoughts upon seeing it were "omg, what is that?" i wasn't scared even though i should have been but this massive green orb seemed like it had to frantically get out of my view which is perplexing. i wanted to go investigate the area where it went down behind the trees but i never got around to it and winter came quickly since this is canada the only evidence i have is my recollection and the video i made waiting to see if the green sphere would rise up above the trees. after seeing this object i have absolutely no doubts that there are alien life forms and i believe that this may have been a non-corporeal life form of some sort since it didn't appear to have any mechanical systems of any kind. it appeared to be pure energy and to have the awareness that i was observing it, since it hid from my view,  which would imply that it was intelligently controlled. i work at a video store and talk to many people every day and a few people have claimed seeing orbs chasing each other quickly across the sky above the lake on canada day a few  years back. i just remembered that there was a place to report my sightings and if anyone else has seen this green sphere near that date or anywhere in alberta it would be a verification that im not going insane even though thousands of people have sighted green orbs throughout history.
content.summary: Glowing green sphere floating above tree tops
